recipe.title: Smoked Salmon Breakfast Salad with Crispbread
ingredients: 2 baby beets or radishes, thinly sliced
4 Wasa crispbread or toasted pumpernickel slices
instructions: Toss beets, onion (if using), mesclun, lemon juice, oil, and capers in a large bowl; season with salt and pepper. Add salmon and gently toss to combine. Mound salad alongside crispbread spread with Neufchâtel and serve with lemon wedges for squeezing over.
